viewData.name: HP 15.6" ZBook 15 G5 Mobile Workstation
viewData.short_description: Buy HP 15.6" ZBook 15 G5 Mobile Workstation featuring Designed for the Creative Professional, 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core 16GB DDR4 RAM | 512GB PCIe M.2 SSD. Review HP 15 G5
viewData.long_description: Thin at 1.0" and weighing 5.79 lb, the 15.6" ZBook 15 G5 Mobile Workstation from HP has been designed to thrive with heavy rendering, engineering, and simulation workflows. It is powered by a 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core processor which allows you to run multiple applications simultaneously. If you need more power, the system can be overclocked to 4.1 GHz using Intel Turbo Boost 2.0 technology. The 16GB of 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM helps to ensure smooth multitasking and also allows the computer to quickly access frequently used files and programs. The 15.6" display features IPS (In-Plane Switching) technology, a Full HD 1920 x 1080 screen resolution, an ambient light sensor, an anti-glare finish, LED-backlighting, a 16:9 aspect ratio, a contrast ratio of 600:1, a refresh rate of 60 Hz, a brightness of 400 cd/m2, 141 ppi, and viewing angles 85/85/85/85Â°. The dedicated NVIDIA Quadro P2000 graphics card has 4GB of discrete GDDR5 RAM and delivers a sharp, clear picture. You'll also be able to output video to an external display at resolutions up to 5120 x 2880 using the system's HDMI 2.0 and dual Thunderbolt 3 ports, the latter of which supports DisplayPort 1.3. For long-term storage of your files, this ZBook 15 G5 is equipped with a 512GB NVMe PCIe M.2 SSD with TLC flash memory, which offers quick access to your data. If you'd like to expand the internal storage, there is an empty 2.5" / 7mm SATA drive bay, plus an additional M.2 2280 slot for SATA and PCIe SSDs. If you want to add external storage, optical drives, memory card readers, and more, the ZBook 15 G5 offers two 40 Gb/s Thunderbolt 3 ports that also support 10 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 2 Type-C. There are also two 5 Gb/s USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports and one USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A charging port. Gigabit Ethernet and 802.11ac Wi-Fi are also built-in for wired and wireless networking, and Bluetooth 5.0 technology will also allow you to connect additional compatible peripherals. So that content from memory cards may be accessed, a built-in SD/SDHC/SDXC card reader supports UHS-II flash media and lets users download content from their digital camera. Other integrated features include a 720p IR webcam for face authentication with Windows Hello, dual-array microphones, stereo speakers with Bang & Olufsen HD audio, and a SmartCard reader. The ZBook 15 G5 includes a 150W Slim Smart AC adapter that operates using 100-240 VAC at 47-63 Hz, a power cord, and an HP Long Life 4-cell / 90Wh lithium-ion polymer battery that can typically be recharged in 3-5 hours, or up to 90% in 90 minutes using HP Fast Charge, and lasts for up to 16.5 hours. The installed operating system is Windows 10 Pro (64-bit) and recovery media is also included. Protection is provided by a limited 1-year parts & labor warranty.
